message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.

I'm very interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be reasonable with my finances.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $10500. It's a great compromise that still reflects the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on funds. I'm willing to go up to $9500, but I really think that's the maximum I can afford. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not comfortable going below $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $10750. It's a fair price that still reflects the product's value to you.
I appreciate your understanding, but I'm still a bit short on funds. I'm willing to go up to $9500, but I really think that's the maximum I can afford. Can you meet me at this price?
